Rationale: Gold standard for outcomes and founder controls; anchors the study; pairs with any text source.
Standardized, time-stamped founder text; large N; maps well to pre-A/A stage; broad tech coverage.
High-stakes, high-quality transcripts; smaller, elite sample; great for mechanism checks, limited generalization.
Rich technical detail; heterogeneous domains (Web3/deep tech); extraction cost; complements for high-integration firms.
Easy at scale but risk of ex-post edits; must ensure pre-funding snapshots to avoid look-ahead bias.
Self-contained text+funding; retail-investor bias; outcome definitions differ from VC; good robustness set.
